name: Don't feed the Beasts
description:
We are a team of 4 student and during a gam jam in our highschool we have 48h to make a game with the topic "Break the rules". So we use the the trivial rule of zoos : "don't feed animals". After a tiny mistake our protagonist has been violently attack by many policemans.
 Hurt, he'll return to the zoo every night of a week to feed them aboard a shopping cart full of peanut but be careful of the policemans.
